meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #339.

td.p: Jack Brodsky, a motion pidture marketing consultant from Los Angeles, California
Pamela Norris, a writer from Sandy Springs, Georgia (whose 2-day cash winnings total $16,800)

tr.td: POLITICAL QUOTES
TOYS & GAMES
TV TRIVIA
ETIQUETTE
ART
SONGS WITH "HEART"
